alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:54PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 454 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Freestone Park, or over Gilbert. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Gilbert, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Freestone Park, Gilbert City Hall, Superstition Springs Mall, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, Fiesta Mall, and Higley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 179 and 193. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 169 and 172. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 29 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
